## NodeCanvasRenderingContext2D.drawImage() method

Draw a region of an image to the canvas at the specified coordinates.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
drawImage(image: NINodeCanvasImageSource, sx: number, sy: number, sw: number, sh: number, dx: number, dy: number, dw: number, dh: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  image | <code>NINodeCanvasImageSource</code> | The image to draw. |
|  sx | <code>number</code> | The x coordinate of the source region. |
|  sy | <code>number</code> | The y coordinate of the source region. |
|  sw | <code>number</code> | The width of the source region. Can be negative to extend left. |
|  sh | <code>number</code> | The height of the source region. Can be negative to extend up. |
|  dx | <code>number</code> | The x coordinate on the destination region. |
|  dy | <code>number</code> | The y coordinate of the destination region. |
|  dw | <code>number</code> | The width of the destination region. Must equal abs(sw). |
|  dh | <code>number</code> | The height of the destination region. Must equal abs(sh). |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
